column1: 表1 : 2019 年按區議會分區及性別劃分的陸上非住院人口數目
Table 1 : Land-based non-institutional population by District Council district and sex, 2019
區議會分區 District Council district
區議會分區 District Council district
數目進位至最接近的百位數。
由於四捨五入關係，個別數字加起來可能與總數不符。
[1] 性別比率是指在人口中相對每1 000名女性的男性數目。
[2] 數字是指撇除外籍家庭傭工後的性別比率。
Figures are rounded to the nearest hundred.
Figures may not add up to total due to rounding.
[1] Sex ratio refers to the number of males per 1 000 females in the population.
[2] Figures refer to sex ratios with foreign domestic helpers excluded.
